item.title: How to Create an Alternative Article in Hugo Static Website
item.description: as a blogger who uses Hugo’s static site as his blog engine, but this time I was faced with a different situation where writing articles on a blog using Hugo simply uses a text editor.

item.title: How to Create an Open New Tab External Link in Hugo
item.description: Here’s how to createexternal link by hugo, so it’s easy when we open a link on one page then the link we open will open in a new tab in the browser.

item.title: Get to Know Cloudflare DNS Service
item.description: Get to know what is Cloudflare and right now I’m only using Cloudflare’s services to use the free service for setting up my blog’s DNS, while on another occasion I will discuss how to set DNS on Cloudflare from the Github page for Hugo’s blog static site.

item.title: Error Failed to Push Some Refs To
item.description: Some time ago I had encountered an error when I was about to post the latest article, as usual I updated articles on this blog because I was still using the services from the GitHub page and I had no intention of moving to use the services from Netlifiy or Forestry because I felt I was still convenient for doing everything, be it updating the latest articles, improving the blog or making changes by pushing it to GitHub.

item.title: Why I Install and Learn Ubuntu in My Laptop
item.description: I use Linux because I want to learn . The main reason I chose the Ubuntu Linux operating system to install on my first notebook was, I was inspired by several technological devices that were built using the Linux operating system, one of which was where various technology servers were built.

item.title: Why Migrate to Hugo
item.description: Finally, from CMS, I decided to use a framework that is said to be the fastest framework. And it really feels like this is the first time I’ve tasted the fun of writing on a blog using a static site, for this other time I decided on a static site generator with Hugo.
